name: Launch Break (itch)
description:
[FREE DEMO AVAILABLE DOWN BELOW] 👇

Launch Break is a fast-paced 4-player local party game, where you must fight over a single chance to escape a crash-imminent spaceship! 🚀⏲️💥

Challenge your friends with all your arsenal, perks and the ability to shape the battleground to your advantage.

**The game currently supports up to 4 players and is playable with one keyboard and at least 1 controller (up to 4).**

Early Access

The game is actively under development and will have regular updates until the official release. Purchasing the game now will grant you access to the current build and ensure you will get all the future versions. If you wish to support it, please send us your feedback or leave a review!

In its current state, the game features a good amount of weapons, power-ups and two levels where you can wreak havoc with your friends!

What you can expect in future updates:

- More playable characters
- More weapons
- More power-ups
- More levels
- More fun
